content: this knitting cowl pattern will guide you in knitting a very cozy and ideal cowl for an all-day outfit it is an easy knitting pattern appropriate for those who are ready to move on from the basic garter or stockinette stitch in the round knitted in the round in one piece this wonderful cowl knitting pattern will be your beloved piece during cold days and nights this knitting pattern is a 6-page fully-detailed digital knitting pattern file that includes guided instructions step by step features the cowl is knitted in the round skill level easy techniques included circular knitting language english this knitting pattern is written in standard english measurements are in both cm and inches cowl sizes teen size 10-12years /adult size the cowl on the photo is adult size cowl height 20 24 cm or 8 9 5 inches cowl width 25 29 cm or 10 11 5 inches materials yarn pronto by mondial 100% acrylic antipilling 87 100 gr approx 103 118 m or 113 129 yards a pair of 8mm u s 11 circular needles 60cm 24 inches length a stitch marker points to the beginning of the round on the circular knitting a tapestry needle to weave in the yarn ends
